title: Why are there two July champion and skins sales schedule ?
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-champion-and-skin-sales 
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule

Actually i don't have a problem with there being two sales schedule at all but what confuses me is that some champions listed on one of the two schedule is missing on the other schedule which made me really confused. What i notice is that Jinx, Vayne, Volibear and possibly more that i did not notice is not present on one of the schedule but present on the other. Can someone from Riot please tell me what is happening ?

replies.body: It's because [this page](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-champion-and-skin-sales) is for last years july sales, but [this page](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/july-sales-schedule) is for this years july sales
